duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in the protection of all company assets, including physical, human, and profit assets.
Partner with Loss Prevention team to monitor physical security policies and procedures.
Report incidents of theft or safety violations and participate in internal theft investigations.
Monitor safety policies and procedures and participate in safety committee activities.
Perform audits to measure accuracy and report production fraud or shortcuts.
Monitor associates and CCTV to ensure compliance and perform data entry of audit results.
Perform Gatehouse operations and data entry as described in the Loss Prevention Manual.
Assist in store inquiries and handle special projects as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent and/or previous Distribution Center, Law Enforcement and/or Store Loss Prevention experience
